explanation: The stage direction 'Il les tient prêt à les déchirer' describes a character holding onto something (likely an object) with the readiness to tear it. This interaction with an object fits the description of manipulating or handling an object, and 'déchirer' (to tear) is explicitly mentioned as one of the verbs related to this category.
stgdir: Il les tient prêt à les déchirer.
